mapper.insert: insert into product(product_ids, pic_Url, specifications, goods_id, price, safety_stock, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted) values (#{productIds}, #{picUrl}, #{specifications}, #{goodsId}, #{price}, #{saftyStock}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{beDeleted})
